# Git Configuration

## Author Information

This repository is configured with the following Git author:

- **Name**: Sukrut Gejji
- **Email**: sukrut@gametheory.com

## Configuration Commands

The global Git configuration was set with:

```bash
git config --global user.name "Sukrut Gejji"
git config --global user.email "sukrut@gametheory.com"
```

## Verify Configuration

To check your current Git configuration:

```bash
git config --global user.name
git config --global user.email
```

## Update Configuration

If you need to change the author information in the future:

```bash
git config --global user.name "Your Name"
git config --global user.email "your.email@example.com"
```

## Commit History

All commits from d5ce24e onwards use the proper author information.

Previous commits (before d5ce24e) may show auto-generated author information but are still valid.
